root.name: Comanche: Maximum Overkill
root.description: Comanche: Maximum Overkill featured the original Comanche game its expansion packs all on one CD. The game consisted of many different missions of varying difficulty levels. Players are tasked to pilot a RAH-66 Comanche helicopter through war zones destroying enemy tanks, SAMs, Helicopters, and buildings with a variety of weapons. The armament in game consisted of a 20mm Cannon, Hellfire Anti-tank guided missiles, Stinger Air to Air missiles, and unguided rockets. The quantities of the weapons varied from mission to mission.
